ygData.subject: Re: Pie Tins
ygData.msgSnippet: If anyone is on the bertoxulous (sp?) server and needs pie tins send me an e-mail. I have a gnome warrior that has specialized in pottery so I can make pie
ygData.messageBody:
If anyone is on the bertoxulous (sp?) server and needs pie tins send me an
e-mail. I have a gnome warrior that has specialized in pottery so I can make
pie tins and skewers for tinkering. You can send me a direct e-mail at
krunde@... and we can arrange some thing.

-Kevin

talonz wrote:

> From: "talonz" <talonz@...>
>
> Has Anybody found out where to buy pie tins? Does anybody in
> Ak'anon or on the island sell them or do I have to goto Antonica?
>
> -Talonz
